com.compendium.core.datamodel.services
Interface IExternalConnectionService

All Known Implementing Classes:
ExternalConnectionService
public interface IExternalConnectionService

The interface for the ExternalConnectionService class The ExternalConnection service class provides services to manipuate ExternalConnection objects in the Connections table.

Method Summary
 boolean createExternalConnection(PCSession session, ExternalConnection connection)
          Adds a new connection to the database and returns it if successful.
 boolean deleteExternalConnection(PCSession session, ExternalConnection connection)
          Deletes a external connection from the database and returns true if successful
 java.util.Vector getExternalConnections(PCSession session, java.lang.String sUserID, int nType)
          Get all the connection of the given type for the given userid.
 boolean updateExternalConnection(PCSession session, ExternalConnection oConnection, java.lang.String sProfile, int nType)
          Update a connection in the database and returns it if successful.
 

Method Detail

createExternalConnection

boolean createExternalConnection(PCSession session,
                                 ExternalConnection connection)
                                 throws java.sql.SQLException
Adds a new connection to the database and returns it if successful.

Parameters:
PCSession - session, the PCSession object for the database to use.
ExternalConnection - connection, the ExternalConnection object to create a record for.
Returns:
boolean, true if the creation was successful, else false.
Throws:
java.sql.SQLException

updateExternalConnection

boolean updateExternalConnection(PCSession session,
                                 ExternalConnection oConnection,
                                 java.lang.String sProfile,
                                 int nType)
                                 throws java.sql.SQLException
Update a connection in the database and returns it if successful.

Parameters:
PCSession - session, the PCSession object for the database to use.
ExternalConnection - oConnection, the ExternalConnection object to update the record for.
String - sProfile, the olf profile name for the record to be updated.
int - nType, the old connection type for the record being updated.
Returns:
boolean, true if the update was successful, else false.
Throws:
java.sql.SQLException

deleteExternalConnection

boolean deleteExternalConnection(PCSession session,
                                 ExternalConnection connection)
                                 throws java.sql.SQLException
Deletes a external connection from the database and returns true if successful

Parameters:
PCSession - session, the PCSession object for the database to use.
ExternalConnection - connection, the external connection to delete.
Returns:
boolean, true if the deletion was successful, else false.
Throws:
java.sql.SQLException

getExternalConnections

java.util.Vector getExternalConnections(PCSession session,
                                        java.lang.String sUserID,
                                        int nType)
                                        throws java.sql.SQLException
Get all the connection of the given type for the given userid.

Parameters:
PCSession - session, the PCSession object for the database to use.
String - sUserID, the user id of the user whose connections to return.
int - nType, the type of connections to return.
Returns:
Vector, a list of the connections requested.
Throws:
java.sql.SQLException
